tool_description: Simple Caesar, Morse, and Numeric encryption
name: 🔴 SIMPLE ENCRYPTION 🔴 Daddy
title: 🔴 SIMPLE ENCRYPTION 🔴 Daddy

api_list.name: Reverse Numeric
api_list.description:
Encrypts plain text with reverse Numeric encryption (A=26 ...) 
Accepts plainText  as POST data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-encryption-daddy.p.rapidapi.com/reversenumeric"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-encryption-daddy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Caesar
api_list.description:
Encrypts plain text with Caesar cipher 
Accepts plain text  and shift parameter as POST data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-encryption-daddy.p.rapidapi.com/caesar"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-encryption-daddy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
